name: StringLoader
responsibilities: Implements the Loader interface using strings as a source
+ StringLoader(String), the constructor which sets the source string

name: FileLoader
responsibilities: Implements a loader via files. These are read and processed through the existing string loader (since both use the same format for data).
+ FileLoader(File), a constructor which sets the input file.

name: JSONLoader
responsibilities: Implements a loader via JSON. Utilizes the File and String loaders when appropriate.
+ JSONLoader(FIle), a constructor that sets the source data via a file
+ JSONLoader(String), a constructor that sets the source data via a string
